title: Liquidation Business 102 - Selling Products on Marketplaces
headline: Check out this free online course to learn how to start an online liquidation shop and stay competitive in the business.
description: Learn how to turn your investments into a profitable seller brand by executing strategic techniques for growing an eCommerce business. Investigate how to obtain a ‘pallet’ containing hundreds of dollars’ worth of products at a fraction of the retail price. Expand the size of your reselling business by using sales channels such as Poshmark or Mercari. Make your acquisitions in the liquidation industry worthwhile with this fascinating course.

courseDescription:
The idea of 'pallet flipping' is straightforward: buy large boxes from distributors or liquidation centres and then resell the individual components for a profit. But have you ever heard of the liquidation business? In 2020, the top website sales domains sold over $2.6 trillion, accounting for 62% of global web purchases. Arbitrage (liquidation, bulk deal, coupon/rebate) on the internet is favourably exponential. This course teaches you to turn those investments into profitable seller brands by sourcing liquidation pallets for pennies on the dollar. Regardless of how small your budget is, you can expect your cash balance to grow as you make investments back into your business. Are you an entrepreneur looking for a fresh and highly competitive challenge? Or perhaps you want to become the boss of your business? Alternatively, if you already trade online, reinforce your business skills with professional guidelines to resell merchandise that pay off time and again. Seize the opportunity to improve your skills as we aim to supply strategic perspectives for the top ten marketplaces, including Amazon and eBay.

'Pallet flipping' isn't foolproof and there is no ‘one-size-fits-all’ solution for online bartering. The programme introduces sales tactics, marketing recommendations and specific tips to achieve the highest seller metrics applicable for various marketplaces like Mercari, Poshmark and eBay. As you complete the classes, you will gain the foundations of the liquidation business. This knowledge will help you distinguish between ‘Fulfilled by Merchant’ (FBM) and ‘Fulfilled by Amazon’ (FBA) by analysing their pros and cons. The course teaches beginners and intermediate associates the fundamentals of Amazon reselling. Discover the profitability of this line of business by learning about automation, product management, search-engine optimisation (SEO) strategies and other applicable approaches needed to scale a high revenue business. The real question here is: is it possible to make a living by flipping liquidation pallets? The answer is: it's worth the effort to use well-structured marketing strategies demonstrated throughout the lessons to help you sell the inventory on various marketplaces. Pallet flipping requires little money and time. Get started with low-cost, smaller pallets and work your way up. You can source from multiple product categories, including electronics, houseware and beauty products.

Enrol in the free course and learn which products are profitable, how to operate your Amazon Store and gain essential insights to conduct successful marketing research. Today’s pandemic's implications on conventional direct sales have resulted in more physical stores or shops migrating to eCommerce. Are you looking to build or expand your digital presence as a reseller? Search no more! By the end of this course, you will have acquired the tools and expertise needed to understand fundamental concepts and strategic approaches to managing scalable reselling in the electronic commerce venture. So start transforming your company and rock those marketplaces. Join now to increase your chances of success.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module explains what an Amazon fulfilment facility does, where orders are chosen, filled, and sent. You will learn about pricing strategies to boost your product listings and the basics of pricing automation by navigating the RepriceIt and Bqool tools. Finally, master the Amazon Seller Central to manage, advertise, and sell products.
topics: Foundations to Resell on Amazon - Learning Outcomes
Tips and Tricks for Amazon Sellers
Foundations to Resell on Amazon - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module explains how to manage your product listings on Poshmark, Mercari, and eBay. You will learn to handle difficult buyers and conduct proper product research for each marketplace and the methods of selling your products effectively on various e-commerce platforms. Also, comprehend the importance of SEO in maximising your sales.
topics: Tips for Multi-platform Reselling - Learning Outcomes
Tips for Multi-platform Reselling - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module highlights the importance of having a high seller ranking on marketplaces like Amazon and eBay. You'll understand how to obtain free boxes and supplies, including the fundamental factors of organising apparel on multi-channel eCommerce services.
topics: Outlines for Liquidation Profitability - Learning Outcomes
Outlines for Liquidation Profitability - Lesson Summary

  • Lesson Summary

    • When shipping to FBA, it is better to save more money when collecting a massive lot all in at once.
    • The last thing you want to do is spend all of your time in seller central managing your products on the back end. It is preferable to outsource that to software, which can automate the entire process for pennies on the dollar.
  • Tips and Tools for Resellers
    • A high-quality tape is required because the regular tape does not hold boxes together well, and you do not want your product to open during shipping.
    • Avery labels are simply small labels that you input into your printer like regular paper. You can print independent SKUs, ASINs, or bar codes to make your product stand out.
    • If you're looking to move and scale this up, you'll need a scale. A standard scale will suffice when you're just starting up.
    • Use poly mailers to separate your shipment if necessary. This wrapping will make you look competent when mailing your items while attempting to sell on Poshmark, Mercari, or eBay.
    • Scotty Peelers and GooGone will give you extra tons of time since you will regularly have to scrape off the tags on the boxes if reusing them to deliver your new products.

  • Lesson Summary

  • Quick Selling Tactics
    • List your prices much higher than you expect to sell them for at first to accumulate views and gain high profits on your merchandise.
    • Do some product research ahead of time before you go out and source items for eBay, Poshmark, Mercari, or any other marketplace.
    • You want the fast and free badge to appear on all of your listings, especially on Mercari.
    • Re-list stale items, which are merchandise that you've had listed for a while on Poshmark, for example.
    • Sharing your closet multiple times per day or automate the process with Simple Posher.

  • Lesson Summary

  • Guidelines to Scale your Business
    • The more high-quality inventory you have, the more sales and profit you will make. Don't be impatient; finding a buyer on these sites is a lot like weirdly the right dating.
    • Remember that high-quality stock photos for your listings are required to take the background away and make it white for your products.
    • Sellhound.com is a website that you can use to do product research on several different marketplaces. You can use sellhound to do a little product research.
    • On eBay and Mercari, ranking your account, getting reviews, and getting feedback is super important. When you list specific products, the more sales history you have and the better feedback you have in your seller account, the higher you will rank.
